name: change-y-axis-range
description: Change the Y-axis range settings for a chart. You can control whether the range is automatic or set custom min/max values. Make sure that the visualization type is `line`, `bar`, `area`, `combo`, `scatter` or `waterfall` before calling this tool.

auto_range.description: Whether to automatically determine the Y-axis range.

min.description: The minimum value for the Y-axis. Only applied when auto_range is false.

max.description: The maximum value for the Y-axis. Only applied when auto_range is false.
